titles.title: Compulsory License Clarification Act of 1993
To amend chapter 1 of title 17, United States Code, to include in the definition of a cable system a facility which makes secondary transmissions by microwave or certain other technologies.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E243)
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Intellectual Property and Judicial Administration.

bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Compulsory License Clarification Act of 1993 - Amends Federal copyright law to modify the definition of "cable system" to include a facility which makes secondary transmissions of signals by microwave or any other technologies employed for the local distribution of secondary transmissions of broadcast programming.
